nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Chameleon Shard\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Reptiloid I\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"Fusing a Chameleon with a Shard\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"grants the next 3 Shards from that\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"Shard’s ID line as a result.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Right-click to send to Hunting Box!\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}","{\"text\":\"Shift Right-click to move all!\",\"color\":\"yellow\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"LEGENDARY FOREST SHARD \",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true},{\"text\":\"(ID L4)\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}]}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"attributes":"{reptiloid:1"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{},"minecraft:profile":{"properties":{"textures":[{"value":""}]},"name":"textures"}}}
